posts.text:
Surprised that no one's mentioned Dyson Sphere Program so...

Dyson Sphere Program!

You're a mech shot out to a random system to build a Dyson sphere around the star. Along the way you fly btw planets then eventually other star systems. Very cool Chinese indie game.

Also Timberborn and Factorio.

posts.text: The Thaumaturge is a very interesting game set just before World War 1 when nationalism and socialism was beginning to fracture the Russian Empire. Terchnically turn-based RPG but more of a mystery game where you summon folklore creatures to investigate and solve mysteries. Rasputin is your homeboy.

posts.text: What I particularly like about SSR and Jelly No Puzzle is that they are very transparent about what is possible (while still being very hard), so the solutions always feel earned.
